text: The 1984 Air Force Falcons football team represented the United States Air Force Academy in the 1984 NCAA Division I-A football season. The team was led by first-year head coach Fisher DeBerry and played its home games at Falcon Stadium. It finished the regular season with a 7-4 record overall and a 4-3 record in Western Athletic Conference games. The team was selected to play in the Independence Bowl, in which it defeated Virginia Tech. ==Schedule== ==Personnel== ==References== Category:Air Force Falcons football seasons Air Force Air Force Falcons Category:Independence Bowl champion seasons
title: 1984 Air Force Falcons football team
